```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
file_list <- list.files('parsed_data/', pattern = "df.csv.gz",full.names = T)
```

```{r}
file_list
```

```{r}
file_dfs <- lapply(file_list[1:4], function(x){
  df <- read_csv(x)
  # first column is NA which gives corrupt DF so need to get rid of it
  names(df)[1] <- 'to_delete'
  df %>% select(-to_delete)
  }) %>% bind_rows
```

```{r}
View(file_dfs)
```
